casebody.data:
BETSY L. ZIERLIER v. JOSEPH N. ZIERLIER [No. 44,

January Term, 1938.]

*697 Decided March 10th, 1938.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shbhan, and Johnson, JJ.

Philander B. Briscoe and Nathmi J. Felsenberg, with whom were Briscoe & Jones on the brief, for the appellant. Foster H. Fanseen, with whom were Milton I. Vogelhut and Henry M. Siegel on the brief, for the appellee. Urner, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
